title: News/Media Alliance Cheers Axel Springer and OpenAIâ€™s Global AI Partnership
description: In a strategic alliance applauded by the News/Media Alliance, Axel Springer and OpenAI have embarked on a global AI partnership aimed at fortifying independent journalism in the era of artificial intelligence (AI). Alliance President & CEO Danielle Coffey lauded the move, citing its potential to establish payment benchmarks and create a precedent for the value […]
